name: Parallel reality on Dream Land
description:
Explore the strange scenes of The Dream Land.

TIP:
If your UI bugs, or cant move the player press F1

Hey DreamLander, i hope you enjoy my game i had a lot of fun making it, but sadly run out of time so the game is a little bit unfinished here and there. I plan on adding more stuff on the post jam version so stay tunned !
